snippet: Cheon Park, who the authorities said diverted hundreds of thousands of dollars in government money to himself, was charged with mail fraud and conspiracy to commit mail fraud.
abstract: Cheon Park, who ran preschool programs for children in New York with developmental disabilities, is arrested on charges that he diverted hundreds of thousands of dollars in government money to himself; Park is charged with mail fraud and conspiracy to commit mail fraud; faces maximum sentence of 20 years in prison.
lead_paragraph: Cheon Park, who the authorities said diverted hundreds of thousands of dollars in government money to himself, was charged with mail fraud and conspiracy to commit mail fraud.

headline.main: Contractor Who Ran Special Education Pre-K Programs Is Charged With Fraud
headline.print_headline: Contractor Who Ran Special Education Pre-K Programs Is Charged With Fraud
